sentences.english: Those findings appear online in the Journal of the Acoustical Society of America.
sentences.chinese: 《美國聲學學報》電子版刊登了上述發現。

sentences.english: Testing of the main engine acoustic environment equipment using microphones and sensors is scheduled to wrap up tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 對主引擎聲學環境測試的工作計劃會在明天完成。

sentences.english: The acoustic principle of detecting flowrate and the level of material by ultrasonic is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹超聲波流量計與物位計的聲學原理。

sentences.english: This paper presents a blind audio watermarking algorithm with self-synchronization based on Psychoacoustic Model.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於心理聲學模型的自同步音頻水印算法。

sentences.english: The paper also introduces some popular acoustics theory involved broadly in speech recognition technology.
sentences.chinese: 描述了聲紋識別技術廣泛涉及的一些聲學特性。

sentences.english: The dominant mechanism by which interventional ultrasound energy dissolves thrombi is acoustic cavitation.
sentences.chinese: 超聲介入消融血栓的主要作用機制是聲學空化效應。

sentences.english: Electroacoustic Architecture offers a means of changing the acoustic properties of a room electronically.
sentences.chinese: 電聲建築爲改變房間的電子聲學特性提供了方法。

sentences.english: It established the direct relationship between stress and strain that is the basis for the formulas of linear acoustics.
sentences.chinese: 他指出壓縮和張力之間的關係是線性聲學的基礎。

sentences.english: A "bolus like" injection was conducted to administrate the contrast agent into left forearm veins.
sentences.chinese: 聲學造影劑經左前臂靜脈“彈丸式”注射。

sentences.english: An error sensor strategy is a key step in implementing an active structural acoustic control(ASAC).
sentences.chinese: 誤差傳感策略是實現主動結構聲學控制的關鍵的一環。

sentences.english: Significance of non-linear acoustics in aerial sound is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論空氣聲中的非線性聲學。

sentences.english: A "bolus-like" injection was conducted to administrate the contrast agent into left forearm veins.
sentences.chinese: 聲學造影劑經左前臂淺靜脈“彈丸式”注射。

sentences.english: A reverb unit simulates the sound of different acoustical areas.
sentences.chinese: 混響單元是模擬不同聲學空間中的聲音。

sentences.english: The ancient Greeks were aware of other acoustical principles, at least empirically.
sentences.chinese: 至少在實踐上，古希臘人也知道其他的聲學原理。

sentences.english: High-sensitivity internal mic for tuning acoustic guitars.
sentences.chinese: 高靈敏度麥克風的內部調整聲學吉他。
